snippet: James Davis of Stevenson told a judge that he would comply with a court order to remove the body of his wife, Patsy, from his front yard.
abstract: James Davis has told a judge in Alabama that he will comply with a court order to remove his wife's body from his front yard; Davis acknowledges that he has lost a four-year court fight with the city of Stevenson to keep the remains of his wife buried outside his home; city said grave as an illegal cemetery.
lead_paragraph: James Davis of Stevenson told a judge that he would comply with a court order to remove the body of his wife, Patsy, from his front yard.

headline.main: Alabama: Husband to Remove Wife’s Buried Body From Yard
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Husband Relents On Wife’s Burial In Yard
